endpoints.description: Retrieve the current inventory levels of all tracked medications and supplies.
Update the inventory count for specific medications or supplies.
Fetch a list of active restocking alerts.
Mark specific restocking alerts as resolved.
Retrieve a log of transactional activities involving medications and supplies.
Add a record of a new transaction for specific items.
Analyze and fetch trends in medication and supply utilization over time.
Submit parameters to receive customized analytic reports.
Fetch the current configuration settings for the service.
Update service configuration settings for specific functionalities.
